fields.name: Operand
fields.description: Parameter name to be used for filter. The allowed operands to query pipeline runs are PipelineName, RunStart, RunEnd and Status; to query activity runs are ActivityName, ActivityRunStart, ActivityRunEnd, ActivityType and Status, and to query trigger runs are TriggerName, TriggerRunTimestamp and Status.

fields.name: Operator
fields.description: Operator to be used for filter.
